properties.areaDesc: Central and Southern Lewis and Clark
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 2:54PM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 10
inches, except up to one inch at lower elevations. Winds gusting
as high as 45 mph. Blowing snow possible at times.

* WHERE...The higher terrain and mountain passes of Central and
Southern Lewis and Clark. This does not include the Helena
Valley.

* WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SUNDAY
